definitions: a person who advocates the interpretation or planning of economic and foreign policy in relation to events and developments throughout the world.
shortDefinitions: person who advocates interpretation or planning of economic and foreign policy in relation to events and developments

definitions: a person or organization advocating or practicing operations across national divisions.
shortDefinitions: person or organization advocating or practicing operations across national divisions

definitions: relating to or advocating the operation or planning of economic and foreign policy on a global basis.
shortDefinitions: relating to operation of economic and foreign policy on global basis
